title: Designed for success: programmed for what?
creator_credit: CES, Bank of New South Wales, Scottcom and Peter Engebretsen
brief_description: Through the eyes of a teenager, explores some of the personal considerations involved in finding a job. Entertaining approach to a difficult question using good clever dialogue and innovative visuals. Cast includes Michael Smith, Basil Clarke, Anne Lambert, Peter Colville, David Wood, Des Mangan.
